level.heading: Elections covered.
level.text: The voting procedures in this subchapter apply to:
A general, special, or primary election for President, Vice President, or District of Columbia Delegate to the United States House of Representatives;
A general, special, or primary election for Mayor, Chairman of the Council, member of the Council, member of the State Board of Education, or Attorney General for the District of Columbia;
An initiative, referendum, or recall measure; and

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For history of Law 19-137, see notes under ยง 1-1061.01.

level.heading: Uniform Law:
level.text: This section is based on ยง 3 of the Uniform Military and Overseas Voters Act. See Vol. 13, Part II, Uniform Laws Annotated, Master Edition or ULA Database on Westlaw.
